Naruto, in his [[Nine-Tails Chakra Mode]], and Minato combine their [[Rasengan]]s and strike the opponent with it. Minato then throws his [[Flying Thunder God Kunai]] at the opponent. The two ninja then bump fists, with Minato entering his [[Nine-Tails Chakra Mode]]. Father and son then use [[Flying Thunder God Technique]] to teleport to the thrown kunai, delivering a series of strikes to the opponent, forming a yellow and orange rasengan-shaped chakra silhouette, which creates a massive explosion, dealing great damage in the process.

[[pt-br:Barragem de Bijū]]
